title: Add predicted number display to prediction interface

requirements.text: Modify the backend Prediction type to include a predicted number field (0-9) in addition to the existing outcome field
acceptanceCriteria: Prediction type includes a number field storing values 0-9
generatePrediction function returns a random number between 0 and 9 for each prediction
Number prediction is stored alongside outcome and confidence in prediction history

requirements.text: Display the predicted number prominently in the PredictionDisplay component alongside the current Big/Small outcome prediction
acceptanceCriteria: Predicted number (0-9) is displayed in large, prominent typography in the PredictionDisplay card
Number is visually distinct from the Big/Small outcome indicator
Number updates automatically when new predictions are generated
Number is styled consistently with the existing vibrant color theme

requirements.text: Add the predicted number column to the PredictionHistory component's table view, showing the number for each past prediction
acceptanceCriteria: History table includes a Number column displaying the predicted number for each entry
Number is displayed between the Period and Outcome columns for logical flow
Numbers are color-coded to match the color scheme seen in the reference image (green for odd, red for even, or similar pattern)
Historical numbers are sortable and clearly visible in the scrollable history view

constraints: Do not modify the 30-second countdown timer mechanism
Maintain the existing automatic prediction generation on timer completion
Preserve the current period number tracking functionality
Keep the existing confidence meter and Big/Small outcome logic
nonGoals: Implementing multiplier buttons (X1, X5, X10, etc.) shown in the reference image
Adding chart or follow strategy tabs
Implementing color indicator dots for predictions
Adding game history period ID format (202602191000052317 style)
Modifying the backend architecture or data persistence mechanism
